strength_details: IBM is a stable, established enterprise with global presence
Clear BI data engineer role with specific focus on Cognos and reporting
3+ years experience requirement is reasonable for mid-level position
concern_details: Traditional BI stack (Cognos) with limited modern data engineering tools
No career growth, learning budget, or development opportunities mentioned
Consulting delivery model may involve client deadlines and pressure
No work-life balance benefits or flexible work arrangements mentioned
best_fit_details: Mid-level data engineers with 3-5 years experience in BI/DW projects
Candidates with Cognos experience seeking stable enterprise environment
Engineers comfortable with traditional BI tools and consulting delivery model
probe_details: Ask about team structure and reporting within IBM Consulting delivery centers
Understand career progression opportunities within IBM
Clarify the technology stack and modernization plans beyond Cognos
Discuss work hours, client delivery expectations, and overtime policies
leverage_details: Strong Cognos Developer & Admin skills are specific requirements
Proven BI/DW project experience with reporting and visualization
summary.overall_assessment: Stable enterprise role at IBM focusing on traditional BI work with Cognos. Good for candidates seeking established company and clear BI/DE responsibilities. Main trade-offs are legacy technology focus, limited growth opportunities, and traditional consulting delivery model without modern data engineering practices.
